ABOUT

전문 브라우 스타일러와 함께 당신에게
가장 잘 어울리는 브라우 스타일을 찾아보세요!

We use Australian LYCON Co’s high-quality wax products since your safety is our priority.
Experienced brow waxing expert and makeup artists create more perfect eyebrow style.

※「캐치업 브로우샵」은 에스쁘아와 프로모션 등 업무제휴 관계에 있는
브로우 바 서비스 매장으로서 에스쁘아의 직영 매장이 아닙니다.

  • Full beauty consulting!
    We do not rush consulting (10 minutes, 15 minutes). We offer service after finding out your skin condition through full beauty consulting with you.
  • Waxing experts provide safe, professional services!
    Waxing experts with national skin qualification help you find the most suitable eyebrow style for you by providing safe and professional services.
  • Even treatment after waxing!
    By placing our priority on skin soothing and protection, we offer premium treatment care after waxing. This maximum soothing effect gets rid of any swelling or redness, so it is an optimal brow service that you can get before your important meeting, gathering, or date after point makeup.
  • Even makeup service by makeup artists!
    Do not hesitate even if you have an important appointment after our service! Our professional artists help in your makeup styling after treatment.
  • Private space
    Our service is provided in a private space, so you can enjoy stable, comfortable services.
  • Reasonable price, the best service!
    Experts with national skin qualification provide safe and professional services. Enjoy the best services at reasonable prices!

EYEBROW STYLING

We help you find the most beautiful eyebrow shape for you through beauty consulting.

  • BASIC SHAPE
    The most natural shape of eyebrow that’s close to a straight
  • ARCH SHAPE
    The arch of eyebrow is smooth, so it provides a soft, elegant feel
  • HIGH ARCH SHAPE
    Elegant image of eyebrow
  • STRAIGHT SHAPE
    Linear soft eyebrow that is not long
  • WAVE SHAPE
    The front area of brow has a flow, and the tail moves
  • ANGULAR ARCH SHAPE
    The eyebrow provides strong structural image and multi-dimensional feel
  • ANGLED SHAPE
    Defined, vivid eyebrow in straight shape
  • ROUND SHAPE
    The eyebrow expresses an overall perfect angle and provides a feminine, warm feel

BROW WAXING

Best-quality waxing product LYCON selected by quality salons and spas in 40 countries worldwide!
Since it is made of the best-quality natural beeswax and aromatherapy,
it provides excellent effect for even 1mm hair that cannot be easily removed.

The product consists of hot wax (hard wax), unique LYCON jet wax, and various treatment products that can be used before and after waxing. It works well with waxing treatment. LYCON spa specialist body care products provide a personal solution that can be used at home while receiving services from the salon
LYCON has been establishing the standard of waxing worldwide for the past several years and playing a leading role in the market in the aspects of quality and performance. The wide variety and quality of LYCON wax allow experts to combine wax products that are most suitable for each customer, so it provides the highest satisfaction to customers
